original: 徐州彭城人，東吳官員。東吳重臣張昭之孫，其母乃諸葛謹之女，其妹嫁給廢太子孫和，可謂東吳政權核心集團成員。後孫峻誅殺權臣諸葛恪時，張震亦被牽連其中。
text: People from Pengcheng, Xuzhou, Soochow official. The grandson of Zhang Zhao, the great minister of the East Wu, and his mother was the daughter of Zhuge Jin. Zhang Zhen was also implicated when the descendant Sun Jun killed the power minister Zhuge Ke.
